outfits_comment: because there might start some friction between men
i doubt that negro & white men can live under the same roof & stay healthy.

long: i am a soldier of the u.s. i'm mighty proud of the fact and consider it a privilege. but i'm anxious to get this over with and go back to what i left behind. we soldiers would like a promise that six months after we could go home. but we want to do a good job.
negro should always be separated from the whites in the south, in every way.
a negro will be better off among negro soldiers than they would among white soldiers as there are always remarks passed about them

outfits_comment: for i wouldn't want a negro sleeping and eating with me not that i am better.
long: this is a fine thing if the right man gits to read them and a bad thing if the wrong fellow reads them. which will happen i wouldn't know.

outfits_comment: would not serve in a mixed outfit
long: would certainly like to see the negro returned to his native home at our expense and in complete justice to him. there is plenty of room in africa where he could revert to canabalism at his convenience. other wise this will eventually become a negro nation

outfits: ['They should be together in the same outfits']
outfits_comment: i believe if they were trained with white soldiers they would be better soldiers.
long: the rich people are the only ones that is profiting in this war
the questions where fair.

i don't like the south worth a damn. the sooner i get across the better i will feel. the damn m.p. are no good at all. this is a very good part on someone. it give a guy a chance to bitch to some one who don't know what a soldier goes through.

(1) i do believe we are getting a fair chance of drilling & i feel right to say we should at least get sat afternoon off. & also a half aof a day thru the week for the rest. and i do think we should get a class a pass when your wife is down at dothen alabama or anywhere close. (2) we also have to sing a song. by that i mean ; we have to learn a song they give us to sing it to get a ""pass""  & i do think it is most unusually unfair () (3) sometimes it seems to me they give us jobs that i dont think is winning any war. only passing away the time.

outfits_comment: we are all in here for the same purpose

long: i think it is a very good idea to have enlisted men express their own opinions about various conditions at home & in the army. it will help to show whether the morale is poor or good.

outfits_comment: whites can get along better between there selveswith out of color people
long: the medical corps are two much like bobscouts.  and i suggess that they should have a little more freedom for thereself like wensday afternoons and saturday afternoons of to get caught up on a little home work. or else a few sports that they like to play the moste. and they commanding officers work with the fellows in the service.

i sincerely believe that there is not ample opportunity for these who desire to apply for officer candidate school. here it is impossible. applications are not approved because there is a lack of strength. i am one of ten or twelve class i men. this group desires an opportunity.  many of our men are in jobs that do not permit a full display of talents. i believe a man adequate method for discovering possibilities should be evolved. why should men with no mechanical aptitude be shoved into the mechanic's position? similarly, why should high intelligence and experiences be used on typewriter ribbons?  soldiers do not keep up with current events. i came in the the army saying, "now i shall see men who know what is happening in the world." what a mistaken idea!

outfits_comment: different races & some don't like each other.
long: why is it that they are taking all farmers off the farms. what will the soldier live on if they can get food. i think they should put some of the framers back on the farms which will help win this war so much faster. as it will keep soldier in a fight sprit. as they fight this war out. all that live on a large farm should be sent back to it to raise food to fight on.

outfits_comment: for the same reason they - should - live - separately.
same reason
long: this is the only outfit i have heard of that has to scrub the barracks with brushes two or three times a week and i don't like this thing they call kp.

outfits_comment: don't allow direct contact with the negro
long: i don't think this war is being fought to give us any more freedom or a better chance to make a living. we have as much freedom as we wish and i think everyone has a chance to make a decent living if they are willing to work

outfits_comment: they seem to team up better separate
long: they should sure ask about the food in the camps. it hasn't been so hot here. i know many more camps that feed better

too much  practising of  hand salute and other fussy nonsense on the part of some who seem to think this is still a peace time army.  too little emphasis on defense against air attack, tank attack, map reading, compass and all phases of actual warfare, and too few officers who have the initiative or intelligence to bone up on this stuff and put it across.
27 because i am small and not very bright
i think this questionnaire stuff is alright. it is a good idea to get the serviceman's idea of different problems.

we can not get tranfered where we would be better satisfies they dont give us a week end leave like the rest of the divisions i dont see why they have some boys out and farms and take other when they are farming the same aeres. i think they should treat every one the same,

outfits_comment: because white an negro soldiers would not get along.
long: i do not think that it is fair to hold the soldiers of my outfit until 5 or 6 o clock on sat afternoon before giving thin a races. i think we have been in the army long enough that we should get of at noon. we do not do any thing anyway an another thing i thing we should have at least 10 days leave before we go across if we go at but 2 a year. other wise i like the army navy well.
i am well sadyes fide in the army

i thing this camp should give more passes & at best a furlough in the first six months i would like to be transferred to the air corps. and if i get that i would like to be in a overseas combat unit. i lon't thing we have enough training for combat yet
i thank we should have more passes in this camp (why) we never get of till 1700 every day and dont have time to go any place

outfits_comment: the morale would be better.
long: more  club  more p.x. more entertainers  more transportation to and from camp  more theater  more u.s.a. shows  more furlough and passes

outfits_comment: the boys from the south won't mix with the negro
i don't fancy the idea of bunking with or near a negro.
long: i believe that the soldiers in and out of the u.s.a. should be kept posted on news of the day. we have few radios and we have no way of being posted of important news without a radio.  a free daily newspaper or a oral report by our officers ever day.
the paltoons in our company don't get along as well they are always fighting. i think something should be done.

the company i am in are not getting along officers or men they are fighting each other. the service platoon and truck platoon will never get along. some times the grub is not too hot but cant be helped i guess. the location is not good for recreation. most towns off limit that are any good.
i like army life very much, and the quartermaster list of any unit. thinks.

id like to get transferred to another outfit it seems like i can't get along with the commersionl officers in the 81st q.m.c. i don't see why it was given out, i don't believe anything will come of it.

outfits_comment: some people would take advantage of them
long: you did not't ask whether the chow was good or not? or how it was being scarred - or ? or whether the army was harmful to your health. or whether the officers & etc have the right to use certain objectives an private at all times? why should married men have more privileges than single men? why shouldn't't the  by more? for bath?  who going to pay there alotments for the married men -?  why shouldn't't men with  be allowed to go home every quarter? -

outfits_comment: there would be too much racial difficulties
i believe my self that white & negro soldiers should be in separate out fits.
long: i believe this questionnaire is ok & i really don't know what to write or say.

outfits_comment: i don't think they should be in the same outfits
long: i think at we should have more time off that is leave like three day poss. the food should be better + more of it

outfits_comment: people from the south dont like them and there'd be trouble and they feel better together so would we.
long: about the negro and white there is goo and bad in every thing. i get along with some and some i don't of both color. i dont like the army, i tried to get in may. the non-comm's we have are from the south west and i dont like any of them or the lieutenant. either. i think its jap's and german's should be crushed for they way the treated the woman & children that's enough for any man to want to fight for. tell them all the  getting isn't so hot but if it's going over to our boys then let them have it. some of the clothes outfit and some dont some time they can but half the time they dont. id like to get out of the army just as soon as the war's over weather i have a job or not just so i got home, then i could make out all night and look for a job or get my old one back. i dont have any faith in any of our officer's or non-coms. id hate to go in battle with any of them.

outfits_comment: because the whites and the colored do not get along so well
long: i think that all farm hands should be released from the us army so they can go back and help produce the rations that are so short in the army. i myself haven't seen better in the mess hall for the last month due to the fact that the farmers had to sell their cows because there was no one to help take care of the milk cows. the army says that the soldier is always well fed but it has to be proven to me.

there is only one thing i don't like about this army and that is. why must they put yankees into a rebel division. in my outfit here, if you're not a southern boy you don't get the n.c.o. rating. the highest rating a yankee gets in this division is a.p.s.c. and he's darn lucky to get that.  i would also like to comment on the food we get here. the only meat we get is goat meat. everybody is getting to look like a goat. all you ever hear on the radio is how the army is getting everything. but where is it going to. we're not getting it. and also where is all this butter and milk the army is supposed to be getting. please let us boys in the army know. we like to hear some lies once in a while.

i believe the army is good for any man, that is in good health, to leave atleast 1 yrs training, and then send them home, and later call i am back the way they need them. this would keep up the morel. of the u.s. army.

outfits_comment: the negro would probably be abused and some white soldiers would be offended
long: pertaining to the question on whether i would like to be an officer or not. i feel that my present job is much more important than any second lieutenant. i am drawing less money than i would as an officer but i believe that i am more service than most 2nd lieutenant.  the type of officers that are coming from the ocs schools now is much lower than last year. too many men have gone to o.c.s. from replacement centers.  i think that officers should be appointed out of the ranks by bn. commanders. infantry ocs is too easy and most good sergeants have a vacation when they go there.  officers and noncom's should be given regular efficiency tests to determine their troop leadership and intelligence. there are too many officers that are just plain lousy and there is no real efficient means of getting rid of them.

outfits_comment: i dont believe in mixing negro and the white to gather
for the reasons stated in numbers 60 and 62.

long: there is too much goldbricking in the army. strong healthy men are given jobs that invalides should have while the chronically sick men go to the field as a rule.  another conterism i have to make is that sometimes our officers are unreasonable in their disciplining of us.  also the medical setup where patients are treated with pills isn't too good where medicare can be obtained. at the front we don't expect excellent medical care, but we would like to get it while still in the u.s.

outfits_comment: people knowing and understand each other better can work or fight better.
long: i can see one reason for so many question on the negro. he is a human being with a mind which able to be training for any field. the southern or went with not aggree that every one has equal chance or should be given a chance. the negro is a developing race at present in it primintive stage. soon they will become mature and will do much to make or country a better place to live. i'n many case's the negro is willing to so operate with the white man with the negro. (specially music) also one more point on another subject. many people in this army are intrutled with power that would not be because they are not liberal mind and who doing it for the money no noncom or officer should gamble or drink in the barrack's but as they are the top men the other can not say any thing about and have to bare it. i believe no alcohic should be sold to soldier on camp or off. after pay day 5 or 10 soldier are 100% efficent  all wester fellow's should be all in one outfit; southe fellow is one outfit; and another fellow is one outfit. we had no fighting all ready with fellow from different part of country then we will even have with the enemy.

outfits_comment: because they wouldn't get along together

long: i don't like negro and write using the same p. x. as they were in one camp i were in and officers should be made through ranks.

the food is o.k. -- but its not cooked wright served out wrong every man do not get his part of the food. the company noncoms do not pull together act more like a private than a noncom -- some do not know enuff to be a private first class private -- made noncoms because hanging around the top rich personal i don't blame a man to do it -- when we get in combat will be some good soldiers to lose their life over it -- for myself if i were make a rating, want it to be given to me because i have earned it.

outfits_comment: there wode be to much fighting
long: 1. we shod spend more time in the field at night. 2. after the soldiers are in ten mo they thank they know all that ther is to know. 3. we weast to much time. 4. a div. should go over after they have two years of soldiering

outfits_comment: as always, it's better i think if they act independently from the whites.
long: 1 i don't see any reason why a soldier that's still in the u.s. but being in the army a year or so, don't get a chance to get transferred to a different div or outfit. 2 rebel officers at least most of them threat yanks from the north as if we were kids or nobody in this wartime army, why i don't even respect my parents & god the way i've to look up to my officers in my outfit, it's strictly one sided for these oklahomans, a hell of a chance i'll have to be a non comm, even if i were to stay in this army ten years after the war. 3 we get too much goat meat & that we don't like, about things like hot-dogs & good meat, eggs, beans, & doughnuts & eliminate some of that crummy stuff like pan cakes & lousy cereals we get for breakfast in the morning.

outfits_comment: yes
long: yes i like it if i get to eat but  it is good but not enough

outfits_comment: whites would take advantage of negro which would end up into serious trouble.
long: i would only like to say this: they should not mix the northerners with the south. there is no cooperation. the morale of the men has it stands is very poor. the food has been terrible. we are not fully clothed as we should be. the way these non commissioned also some commissioned officers give out their orders, breaks up the morale. morale and food is of vital importance in any line of military service also in civilian life. morale & food is very poor in this outfit. you may not believe what i have to say, but if you was to mix in with the men, especially around the px and service clubs and listen to what they have to say, you will learn a lot, and will agree that the morale, food and servis is very poor. i hate to be with this outfit in combat, because there will be more fighting among themselves done than the fighting done with the enemies. many men don't forget how they have been mistreated. they are waiting for the day to get even. it will be terrible if they want .

outfits_comment: i dont think white soldiers should be to gather with negro, as they dont get along.
long: if the army put some of the men in the branch of the services they like to be in. most of the man would be better soldiers.  than they are by putting them any place. i am an infantry man and i dont belong in this outfit for  there are other branchs of the services where i would be better outfit for.

outfits_comment: because of the extreme difference of living conditions, separate outfits would be suggested.
long: the outfit to which i am presently attached gives me little or no chance to show my abilities. for this reason, rating's are hard to obtain, and again because this outfit was at full strength when i entered it, with all its officer's and non-comm's already chosen. because they're from the west, and we from the east, whenever a non-comm is chosen, he is always chosen from the west. this showing, that most of the time, the more capable man is "taking" an order, instead of giving one. for this reason, , what should be maintained, is lost and all other interests along with it. (a baseball player is chosen, because of his playing abilities, and not because he knows the manager. if this were not true, you would eventually see, the team losing the majority of their games, while the other chosen for their abilities would be the victor) why then, doesn't this, apply in the army?  pay in the army, is little enough, - then why pay $4.00 to go to some small town, not more than 70 miles away, for little convienences, which could be easily adminestired in the camp itself.  if i had another chance, i would most certainly pick that branch, of the service,(preferably the air corps) where men are chosen, for & by their abilities. (a gunner is not a pilot, and a pilot is not a navigator.) perhaps if men were given, the job they are best fitted for, they would enjoy their duty, and would take greater interest, in the welfare of their outfit, along with this, and a little "common sense", i'm sure their outfit would be one of the best, if not the best, and one would take pride in saying, that he is an attached member to that unite- (the training what i've under gone, in the past 13 months, would be of no avail in civilian life.)

outfits_comment: due to the fact living together would create fights, whereas out in the open it isn't so bad

long: will the first thing we have to match walking and not enough eats. the next thing is i can't make the hikes like i wish i could for i have had my leg broken and it  and i cant get any thing done about so that makes me feel bey unhappy.

outfits_comment: because white boys and damn negro dont mix
long: if we can't go over seas before long why we cant wear our 45 division insignial i think it would make the morale better for when we go to town all the other outfits wear theirs and we look like a bunch of rookies and are called one such in a while. which starts a fight and ends up with the m.p. with us causing the company commander trouble all over us not wearing our   thunderbirds

i think their should be a question about the food situation. the food in the south is very poor. usually a man burns up quite a big of energy in a day and he therefore should have the ingredients to build up enough stamina to combat diseases.

outfits_comment: we  get along better when were separated.
long: the eats in the army are poor. the noncom are dumb. they treat us like a bunch of kids. not enough furlough. i dont think our co. commander could write is own name he the dumbest man i ever met. all they give us to eat in our co. is goat about 10 times a week. they should give each man a chance to join any service in the u. s. a. army. then the men would work harder because half the men in our div dont like the infantry at all.

outfits_comment: i dont believe that it would make a good combat outfit
long: i think that combat units left in the u.s. should be feed better.  i think that this questionnaire is a good idea for it get the comments of all enlisted men in the armed services
i am fairly well satisfied in the army, if they just let us move where we can have someplace to go off the post. i think they have to many places restricted from soldiers.
i don't think the officers we are recieving now has enough of experience. old army sergeant gets tired of training new officers.

outfits_comment: they just will not mix
long: i think it will be harder for ex soldiers to get jobs after the war because most peopel will forget they were soldiers an want younger men. and a lot will be cripple & stove up not be able to do much work. i would ask the president why not put strikers in the army at $50 per mo if they are not satisfied with from $10 to $10 per day. a lot of boys in the service would be glad to do their jobs for less & could do just as well maybe better
i think this questionnaire is alright if they could do what they say in here. because i think there is a lot of fellows who shouldn't't be here.

i think they should have some kind of a test for pvt. and noncoms and if a pvt. is a better man something should be done casue as for the non coms i'v never seen a sader bunch then they have here, no kidding is some cases its a shame what they have leading us. and as i said about the mess sgt. i think he runs the co to much oh yes the south and north don't get along any to good. i think all northern boys should be together and the same for the south. give us good leaders and i'll want to go and fight, but with what we got i feel we don't have much of a chance coming back unless we make the changes when we get there overseas. could we vote for leaders? seems like the men know who would make good leader they know more than the capt does about the men

outfits_comment: we are all fighting for united states.
i think they should be kept in separate outfits.
long: the food is not good in this camp i am in. when their is something fairly good to eat, half of the men leave the mess hall hungry, as there is not enough. i think this outfit i am now in should be sent across to fight. it was one of the first in active service and is as good now as it ever will be for combat. i have been in 1 year and it doesn't seem fair to keep me in this country and send other fellows across who have been in for only 2 & 3 months. would like to know what keeps us from being sent across to combat? the government is spending to much money shifting us around to so many differnment camps

outfits_comment: it would never work because of the racial hatred between white and black.
long: in general--i find the food in our outfit very poor, and usually their is not enough to go around. the cleaning service is bad and laundry even worse. we are not getting the right kind of training for combat. too much hikeing. and not enough shooting. i think some of our officers are good while a little over half are putrid. clothing is swell with exception that infantry drivers are not dressed warm enough in cold weather. in closeing i hope that all outfits are not like mine. if they are we will never win this war until we are gray hair men.  the civilian poupulation sticks soldiers in nearby camps, especially in this area. the government is wasting money sending these out.
officers are to easy with men. some officers should not be officers, but they are.  men are not satasified with the branch of service there in

outfits_comment: maybe they would be good for night patrols
i also think mexicans should be in separate outfits.
long: as i was saying about the mexicans is that they should have different  because the mexican people talk the spanish language during their training duties and most of the white boys can't understand them.

outfits_comment: white and negro soldiers just don't get along especially when they drink and some soldiers will drink no matter.
to keep from fighting
due to difference of race as most people cant stand to many negro
i would not like to be with a bunch of negro
they could not get along with the men here at all.
long: question 50 - in towns close to army camps the police usually don't think too much of soldiers. question 51 - some m.p.'s are nice guys + some should be in the infantry. it is impossible to get along with some i know.
sometimes the food is damn lousy and at time not enough.

outfits_comment: because some whites don't like negro and negro don't like whites

long: i have no question on what the questionnaire covered. it just did not't cover enough. about the food most of it is pretty good but the meat is poor. they feed or try to feed us too much goat. all the boys holler about goat meat. about the negro i am strictly against having them associate with the white soldiers. they wouldn't get along together.

outfits_comment: for the single reason the south own fellows still think they are slaves and they treat them like dogs.
long: this questionnaire is all right but it's unfair to ask a white person to give his opinions about a negro, for 9/10 of the white race nether have them all hellish. but myself, while in civilian life, had a very good negro friend, so perhaps this is why i like them. you must take into consideration all race have all different types of people. some of  biggest criminals in the u.s.a. are white people, but they can always buy their way out, while a negro get the limit for his crime. the a negro fucking a white girl, why this is always played up big in the papers and he always get a big term for it, but on the other hand they never say anything about a soldier doing the same to the negro race. so in my opinion, it just isn't fair.

as we are taking some training in beach landings i have found out a few thing that cannot be done at night one of them is as you know when you land on the beach you want to get off of it. but as i have found out that you cannot run at night the enemy has barb wire up. well we tried that the other night about running off the beach. i landed in the hospital. so i have learn you cannot run at night on a beach landing. you have got to feel your way though the wire. i have been in service since 1940 i feel like i should be across instead of the boys with 3 & 4 month training.

a soldier training for a solid week looks forward to a weekend of relaxation to get away from the camp. as mentioned before transportation is terrible than the prices asked for to take you into town and back again are pretty high  the prices in the surronding towne are exceptionally high, their to congested to top it all the least little thing that goes wrong they blame it on the soldier, so they restrict us from those towns and that ends our means of enjoyment.

outfits: ['They should be together in the same outfits']
outfits_comment: america is a groups of mixed races and the colored man will die as quick as the white in defense of his country
long: there is one question. some times brothers make good teams why do they split them now. before the war they wanted them together now they don't. why?

outfits_comment: lowers standard of the white men. let negro think he has right to go with white women.
long: reason i think i do not want to stay in army after war is over is because i have a complet outfit of stock and implement to farm with and they are laying ideal on the count of shortage of labor and i like that kind of work. reason i would have like to got in the cavalry is that i could have learnt some about taking care of sick horse and it would have been practical to me after war is over.

outfits_comment: i think a lot of trouble would start if they were together.
long: i don't believe i have anything to write concerning the questionnaire, i would like to make a comment on the food that we get, i think they could do much better. it's a good thing you can buy cake and candy at the px. i also have a comment to make on train connection, surely they could have better connection for soldiers

i think there could be some improvement in our chow. for instance, we aren't getting nearly as much, meals, eggs, butter, coffee, now as we were, in the east. and i also think that the food that is cooked in large containers should be seasoned in the process of cooking than to, have to when eating. our sox are to light for the amount of hiking as we have to do. i don't think there should be any discrimination, between guardmen, and selective service men.

outfits_comment: being together might cause trouble between the whites and the negro.
long: this questionnaire is a very good ideal. it can get the ideal of every soldier and by putting these together there could be a big ideal that would help all the soldier in the serivce. i  do think that they need all the breaks they can get.

outfits_comment: i mean in platoons but could be in the same companies.
long: why don't they have a question such as asking the person why he feels he has not advanced in rank & if he thinks he should be advanced. personally, i think the questionnaire is a little crazy. why don't they take the person's name & try to do something for the person. this way i don't see how they know who they are helping out or if they will help anyone out.
i would like to say that this is one of the finest questionnaire in my option for getting a soldier option on his army life
this questionnaire is very clear and made up so the uneducated can give a good opinion of the questions asked.

63 - just as mark twain said or wrote, "east is east and west is west and never the twain shall meet, it should be with color and white races. a white man married to a color girl is terrible but a white woman married to a color man is repulsive. i do not want to see it, tho in new york city, it is very common to see in the negro district, blond women going out with negro men, tho i can not say whether married or not.

outfits_comment: they can work better together because there use to being together.
long: i think this is a good questionnaire. it gets an opinion of the people about positively everything.

outfits_comment: they are fighting for the same country and same flag -
the two would not cooperate as well as if they were one group.
long: i think this questionnaire is a good idea providing you use them for what they are worth.  after all, the soldier knows better how things are in the army, than those who are on the home front.  i think better and more food could be given to the soldiers, especially in some camps. in some it is good, but in others it is very poor.  i thank you for the privilege of expressing my opinions.

outfits_comment: because they are not the same as us
long: will i think some places should have better food i will take civiloen life before any

outfits_comment: there are too many kinds of white people, most of them are not level headed.
long: i should like to ask why the soldiers don't get better food, in this camp i know that no civilian in washington would or is eating the kind of crap we are getting here, the food here is terrible, and we can't blame it on the cooks because they don't get any thing very decent to cook. to be a good soldier you must have good food, and we don't have it. every man in this out outfit has the same opinion. are the english people eating our food, or are they still drinking

outfits_comment: they are intirely different type and class of people.
there is still the same reason as before.
long: the question of negro and white soldiers are one thing i've wondered about. at ft. sevens mass. the negro + whites go to the same theaters + service, it is better i think for both of them to be separated.
as far as mixing the collard and white men in the same outfit it wil never work for we have men from all parts of the u.s. in every outfit.
i think this idea of questioning every soldier like this is an excellent idea.

don't get enough food. don't like the top kick, or skipper.  too much partiality towards their own kind.  furloughs not given fairly to us it's left to the captain and he sticks for the pepper bellies which is 80% of this outfit. figure it for yourself
would like better food, and plenty of it. we have had no butter or eggs in my company for two weeks. more cooperation from the comm officers. get rid of all the gold bricks.

i think the drafted men have a much harder chance for promotion when placed with a unit once a national guard outfit.  i know of several cases, of men with an i.q. rating of 115 or over, interested in army life in general.  they try hard for advancement but take order (and obey them) from men who are not as competant as themselves.  i think rating should be given only to those would pass tests, and were able to qualify for the rating.

outfits_comment: they would not get along

long: i believe the amount of food is not sufficient for a hard working soldier, neither is it properly cooked.

outfits_comment: fore same reason as stated on question 61
long: i believe in doing my part for my country and i am willing to continue as long as we are fighting. i am willing to sacrifice anything.  most of the fellows in my outfit are always kicking about the food, excluding myself. sometimes we have plenty of it, only poorly cooked. i think that it should be the duty of the higher officers to see we have registered cooks. they have fellows in my company that have gone to cooks and bakers school working in the field. i think it is our company commander. he doesn't know much of anything. i think politics shouldn't't be mixed in the army. that is what is taking place in my batlallion.

outfits_comment: they are people just the same as we

long: the rations in our outfit are getting small by the day and what little food we do have is only about half prepared or done so well it can't be eaten. how about a few new cooks?

outfits_comment: i wouldn't stay in a outfit with only  iff i had to

long: it seems as though being here in a training camp in the u.s. or right in your own back yard that the army should feed the boy's better than they are, every good soldier expects that when he goes on a battle field or any place engaging the emeny that he may not have much or anything to eat for day week, month, and that is the time to test his endurance not to train a man to starve to death in a camp. the food situation can be greatly  improved,.

this questionnaire is mentioning questions about negro, but no other nationality with the same social basis. no questions asked concerning our impressions on, food, morale, clothing, no questions asked why perhaps a  train depot has been officially put off limits, thereby lowering the morale of a soldier. in general this questionnaire is alright.

i would like to stay in the army after the war if i could into the cavalry because i think a soldiers can do better if they let him get in to the outfit he likes best. i don't get much of a chance to show what i can do in the medical.

the soldier should be given more liberties so he can get home more often because he never knows when he is going overseas and then he may never return.  more passes and furloughs, more time to himself.  the non-coms should not play favorism as some do.  display of equipment and inspections every week won't kick hell out of the japs and germans. what the hell is the use and sense of this displaying of equipment and inspection every week. the hell with it.

outfits_comment: it just wouldn't work.
it is looked on with disrespect by the southern to have to mingle with negro. they simply don't like it.
long: 52 most of the farmers in the army should be let out so they could do more by producing food stuff for the army to eat. i fear there will be a shortage of food unless congress do something about here.
q.54 england always has and always will take credit and leave us holding the bag this time get our just returns.

52-3 men are willing to do all they can but are afraid when they are sick to go to the medical detachment for fear there is two hours extra duty for them whether they are sick or not. i would think if a fellow is to go to the medic's and get cured but not to go there and then come back and work two hours after drill. i will say it is being done in my outfit and there are men who are afraid to report to the medic's. if the fellows were treated right i am sure the battery commander would get the best of results

outfits_comment: prejudices against one another is bad for the morale.
long: 20 - i'm not interested in my job because i don't think it plays any part in this war of ships and planes. theres not any chance of promotion in it. its also very dull and monotonous.

outfits_comment: i think individual groups would work as one unit better rather than mixed.
long: question #35 is the one that interested me the most. it mainly concerns the lines of my mother & dad. both are over 50 & the war has affected them greatly. i have seen my father age considerably from worrying about his work. he is at present a head of a firm & the shortage of manpower has threatened his job considerably. my mother too has aged due to two of her sons being in the service. my other brother & sister are married & live away from home leaving both of them pretty lonely. what i would like to know what could be done to make their life at the present as pleasant as mine. no other comments other than i think this war has really benefited man as a whole i know i have learned more in 10 months in the army than i did my previous 26 years.

outfits_comment: these will be two separate groups, no matter how much they are mingled.
long: some of the questions call for a lot more discussion than we can give them here -  in general, it is a very good idea to have the enlited men's opinion in the questionnaire is in very good taste. question 6 - i am a qualified engineer (stationary) have had marine experience. would like to be in the engine room on a troop transport or a mine planter or sweeper. don't think i'll ever get a chance as long as i'm in this outfit.

question 24  i am not doing much for my country now laying around pickett doing the land salute + right + left face by the number's ship me accross + let me do my part take any outfit to get action not necessarily the one of my choice.  the whole idea of this questionnaire is very good + should be more of it.

56 to 63. i can't answer these question. in the north the negro is in the minority and the white people have no dealings with them. they are more or less a very poor class of people. maybe its our fault but thats the way it is. i don't think i'd want them in my outfit in the army as i'd feel out of place among them. the same px and service clubs would be alright as far as i am concerned.
i think in the army all requests for transfer should be considered & not immediately turned down.

outfits_comment: i thing negro should be in separate outfits as there is some bad feeling between white people an negro.

long: the entire army seems to be run very poorly. - too much waste of everything. politics should be kept out of the army so that a soldier may gain on his own merits instead of ass kissing.

i am a college student (or was before being drafted). since coming into the army i have been given no chance at promotion whatsoever. i'm no better than the next fellow or no brighter perhaps but at least i think that when non-coms are made, the promotions should be based on comprehensive tests both written and otherwise, and not on the basis of knowing the right people or other hocus-pocus. give every man a chance to prove his worth.
i do not understand why such a large part of these questions deal with negro versus whites. i fail to see the connection between that and "why i like the army or do not"
i would like to know if we will be kept here for 6 months after the war - an will we have to go across
i will say this, i do think the drafts boards should be checked, thoroughly before married men with children are accepted.

outfits_comment: to me as long as we get this job over with
long: the people down here around the camp shelby act so different to me  people up north i don't if it is because i am a m.p. or if they don't like the people from the north. some still thing the civil war is still on.
i believe this questionnaire is a very good idea. a soldiering opinion is worth a lot to the army. after all it is the armed forces that wins the war.

the buss service is poor the buss should run to different parts of the camp the buss station should be in different parts of the camp you half to walk about 2 miles to a bus you half to walk to a buss station to get a buse you cant get a buss along the street they are to loaded you half to stand up all the way to town the bus should run to other parts of the camp.

outfits_comment: separately better team work will exist and a higher spirit with both.
long: i like the outfit i am in but would like more action and more independent work than we are doing. overseas or anywhere. every man should be asked if he thinks himself in condition to do overseas duty regardless of his age.

in regards to the negro soldiers and the whites, the northern negro has his diffucultes when he meets a southern soldier - the northern white soldiers are called nigger loving northerners by some of the white southern soldiers

in regard to the negro question -- i am a northerner and have lived in a city with large negro population i have found them good, hard-working citizens who are all right if whites do not lord it over them. i think the south is wrong in regard to negro; they fear the negro will do to them as they have done to the negro. they fear the retribution of their own sins. i am white, but i think the southern mind in regard to this question is blacker than any negro skin. how can we fight to protect minorities from totalitarianism and allow terrorism in our own country of a minority. if we fight sincerely. we should take car of this problem of ours first. otherwise that part of our eventual victory - the salvation of minorities from oppression - is shallow and false. let us look to ourselves first!

if the avowed purpose of this questionnaire is to meet some of the problems mentioned herein, & since many of the questions are of a personal nature, how will the army be able to help things by this questionnaire if they don't know specifically who has the problems. for instance, one question asks what branch we'd rather be in. now i gave my choice - the one in which i believe i could serve the country best - but the army doesn't know who i am, so how can they help me? i think names & outfits should be included & the papers examined by an impartial board composed of people who don't know the outfit or the personnel in the outfit of the questionee. then specific problems could be met.

outfits_comment: they should be in separate outfits because they fight better.
long: this is a very fair questionnaire to find out the thoughts in the minds of most service men.  in my outfit 100% want over seas service why cant they give the limited service man a chance to really get in there. in our present job we would work good with prisoner in the battle area thereby releasing men outfit for combat duty.

outfits_comment: i believe this would give them colored boys more esprit delaware corps
long: this questionnaire's trouble lies in the fact that it asks opinions that cannot be given in one word and wants them put into one of the mimeographed categories. however it probably keeps a lot of gold-bricking brass hats busy and thus keeps them out of the field. this in itself makes the project worthwhile to the enlisted man.
concerning question #41. my job was a better job than my job now, i had worked at it for almost three years, the wages are about the same but the hours are different.

outfits_comment: some men can't get along with the negro
long: bus service is poor. and drivers are hard to get along with sometimes. they should have swimming for the men in the summer that would be a great help and a lot of recreation.

outfits_comment: the same as the p.x. idea
long: personially i think we loose to much time in training our me while we are so slow training those poor boys on the front are loosing their lives ever day why not rush it up & try to save those fellows lives that are in front their lives means just as much to them as any man that is getting to stay behind. my life is no better than the other fellows & ever one should feel that way.

i do not wish to start anything between the colored and the white, but i like a negro in his place and his place only. if any of my children will ever have to go to school with them, i will keep them at home. if the north want it that way, they can do so. i don't want to make trouble with the negro race, you asked for my opinion and got it.

outfits_comment: because i think they work much better separated.
long: i believe it is a real good thing to find out about different opinions of all the soldiers, and i also think a soldier would be more pleased to be stationed closer to home. and i think he would make a better solider i know i would.
the outfit that i am in has had but little training with guns and think they should have more
one thing i don't thing there would be so much food wasted if they would leave stuff out of it  ut of it we dont have much to take up owner minds we are train to hand

outfits_comment: becous the negro thing that they can run the place
long: i am having a good time some of the time are the reast of the time i am worrying over my wife and baby.

outfits: ['They should be together in the same outfits']
outfits_comment: they are facing the same kind of tasks as rest of us.
long: why should non-coms who have spent a lot of time in the service  who happen to be a little over age be allowed to get commissions. these men are sitting in offices doing the work of officers, who would not be able to function without these same men.

outfits_comment: a chain is as strong as its weakest link! bad feeling is detrimental to morale!
long: i am a 1-b man, so classed only because of poor vision in one eye. the other eye is perfect and in every other way i am 1-a material. i applied back in march 1941 for camouflage (army) & was turned down due to this bad eye. i do feel that i could learn more & be of much more use to the army in a branch into which i could outfit my natural ability. there ought to be some way to put a limited man into a spot where his abilities & not his physical standards count most!

outfits_comment: the colored are happier with "buddies" of their own race, same goes for whites.
long: they should be given more often!!! also the company morale should be given the deepest consideration on the basis of good or bad! if the latter, something should be done about it! i think, too, the briefness of answers to many of these questions in inconclusive. a person opinion usually requires pages..... not lines. i sanction this type of questionnaire one-hundred percent!!

outfits_comment: because of human nature.
long: my comment is, i am sorry that i can not write my name and serial no. and to be asked to go washington d.c. to face any one they want me to.  may god lead us through the leadership of our president, toward victory.

outfits_comment: white's feel they are better.
long: as far as i am concerned, i am a true american born of jewish parents, that were born in russia, but i was born in maine. i am a farmer by trade keep a lot of cattle, raise crops, and in the outfit i am now so fat it has been a big waste of time and money where anyone if they wanted to, i mean if they put them selves out to do more could not benefit anyone of the country in anyway unless, things change as an example. 2 good men could benefit the country more by working on a farm or in a defense plant more than the whole company has in the last 5 months. the us is helping the boys to be lazy, but is putting on weight for the boys, and getting some of the defeated, bettered physically

at the time i was drafted in the army i held a civil service rating as a mechanic and asked at the classification bater to be placed as an air craft mechanic. i was told i could have volunteered and received this branch of service but since i was drafted it was not available to me. why should the army be conducted in this manner if they really need aircraft mechanics as they claim?

outfits_comment: when i was inducted (drafted) in the army i was classified 1b, limited service. at reception centre i was classified as radio operator. i imagined i would get in the signal corps but instead i was placed in the military police escort guard company i feel i could do much more and be of much more use to the army in the signal corps as i have had experience as a radio operator and am familiar with code and all its phases. i feel i would be much more suited to any radio job in the signal corp, preferably code instuctor, than to the work i am now doing in the military police escort guard company we have no radio communication equipment connected with this outfit, and if we did i think i would do much better and put all i had into the job if i got it.
long: when i was inducted (drafted) in the army i was classified 1b, limited service at reception centre i was classified as radio operator. i imagined i would get in the signal corps but instead i was placed in the m.p. escort guard co. i feel i could do much more and be of much more use to the army in the signal corps as i have had experience as a radio operator and am familiar with code and all its phases. i feel i would be much more suited to any radio job in the signal corp, preferably code instructor, than to the work i am now doing in the m.p.e.g. co. we have no radio communication equipment connected with this outfit, and if we did i think i would do much better and put all i had into the job if i got it.

i have enjoyed filling out this questionnaire as it has given me a chance to put down on paper my own personal thoughts and also stimulated thoughts on subjects which before had been given little time to.

outfits_comment: they are thus able to do what they want and punish in their own manner for offenses and know more fully their men's attitude and capacity
long: outfits on completing training should be sent across. too much red tape in securing favors. there are a lot of parts in the army routine which seem almost ridiculous, don't make sense, but we have to drop our logical conclusion and give in because they are army regulations. these regulations should not be enforced in all respects everywhere, only where there is need. there should be a little more entertainment for soldiers, not great symphonies but little daily indulgences. soldiers should not be sent to the other side of the country for training when there are similar camps nearer home.

outfits: ['They should be together in the same outfits']
outfits_comment: we are one army and there for should fight as one.
long: in question twenty i stated i wasn't interested in the army because for five month we haven't done the job we were brought here to do. i really believe i'd be more useful in a war job and all the rest of the 1b men in the army.

my army training is good but personally i feel that when we actually get to doing the type of work for which we have been trained i will be doing more real good for my country and flag of which i am proud to be defending.

outfits_comment: in this manner they will fight much better and get along much better with one another
long: i think it is a very poor idea, for in my opinion nothing will be done about all the questions i have just answered. just a waste of time.
i don't believe men over 35 years of age should be in the army except officers, young blood is what we need and what we have got to have to win the war.

i dont see why a officer or non comm shouldn't't associate with a pvt. i think they should, for they could find out what a men really is, they can't tell by just seeing a fellow on a field you have to see him all around not only on the field, see how he acts after working hours and he talks to people his maners and etc. i don't think a commission officer should have more privelage then a pvt. for they are in the same army and fighting for the same thing and i think the pvt. dose most of the fighting at the front, so i think the privelages should be the same.

outfits: ['They should be together in the same outfits']
outfits_comment: that would promote the feeling of unity which should tie the whole army together.
long: i think it is impossible for a fellow to give a useful and constructive opinion to the army in a test like this.

men over 35 yrs of age, especially men in  are not good soldier material. our country has thirteen million men 18 to 27 yrs of age. limited service men are a hinderance to the army training program. these men are of more use to the defense industry

outfits: ['They should be together in the same outfits']
long: there is too much friction between the white officers of the south and the men of the north.  the treatment of the negro in the army while in the  is unfair.     staffed with abled bodied men who should be put in the field the equipment in many cases is too expensive when cheaper material would do as good a job.  better supervision of the cooking of food  good  to lack of experience  the stressing of personal hygiene more strongly particularly with southern soldiers & officers.
why did not't you put a few questions about the food we get here, & how it is cooked. i know it is hard to cook for so many men but i think it could be better than it is.

outfits_comment: a negro outfit can work more smoothly with all men of its own class or race
long: there are plenty of ratings given not on the ability of a soldier but on how he fits with the first sgt. also there is to much red tape when materials are needed for jobs. court maritials are not quite as fair as they might seen because the men who judge are many times a very good soldier but a poor judge of human nature. also no trail board is every consistant many time for the same offense a difference of once again what a soldier gets for sentence at a trial there is no specified time if a officer is in a hurry to go some where than guilty is the verdict without question it is a common saying in the army that you are guilty before you are tried

outfits_comment: because they are of different nature
long: i  never knew what any camp was like until i entered the army & my honest opinion is that i'm very much satisfied & i hope to stay in it long enough to be able to help in any way

i believe this questionnaire to be a very fine way to get honest opinions of service men on their ideas & personal feelings about the army of the united states and under whose restrictions we are now serving and far as i am concerned all soldiers just sow what they reap in other words it is up to the soldier, himself if he puts forth enough effort to do his part willingly, why he will be given a more than fair chance towards advancement and he cannot gripe if he does not, because the u.s. army is the greatest one in the world, as to good food, plenty of recreation, and the best of clothing, what more could a man ask for as a soldier in the time of war.
more time off for furlough.
i have a question that does not cover this but it should be. most of the fellows bought belts & garrison hats & then orders come through not to wear them. why?

in regards to question 26. i am worried, in fact, too much. i have been in this climate 1 year and have gotten an illness that i'm afraid i'll carry out of the army with me if i don't get a change.  in regards to question 40. i say it will be harder to get jobs because certainly the women working at war jobs certainly is not going give up after working and making a salary that could make them independent in their own right  question 32. i volunteered but since i've been here at camp so long and not much good for combat duty. i feel i could do better in a war job. i feel as though i was accomplishing nothing.

i dont think the old soldiers are getting a fair chance at getting a commission in the army most of the officers we have now is too young & havnt got what it take, it isn't what you know, it is who you know. it seems up. to now i dont know any one ov er a master. sgt., i think most old, soldiers would make better officer, because they have to show nine of every ten what to do. i would like very much to sign my name but is just cant be done

not only do i think the white soldiers should be separated from the negro but they should be separate camps for the negro. i only hope the united states do not stop this war until germany and japan has been completely wiped off the face of the world.
i have not a thing to say because i take it the way it comes.

outfits_comment: but i don't meant to mistreat them
long: they said before that there was no way of telling who made this and you can and they most likely will!  does this really do any good?

outfits_comment: they will work better among their own race
long: this is a good way to help the boys and have more satisfied soldiers.
i am driving a wepnes carry and i think i should have t/5 corpal because our jeep driver has there and that way i think i should have mine to.
i don't think we're getting a square deal on our mess.
in regard to rating most of the men i have talked with point out that fuctionality as being shown to a great extent from the co down to the platoon sergeant.
i can't understand why we can't get more of a furlough while we are still in the united states. i hope the food would get better-
our mess is any to good i think we should have better trained cooks.

outfits_comment: a negro can out drill any white man.
long: there is just to much favor shown to some of the other enlisted men.  and to much goldbricking in the whole army. why stay over here for a year or so and get what is nown as  when we could ve over there fighting and how this mess cleaned up.

outfits_comment: they get along better
long: i think draft board don't draft men right. they take them of the farms so farmer can't produce good with help. take them out of the city more. my draft made a young man rent his farm out to some people so he could service his country. i think he would have done more good on the farm. there should be less men taken from the farm in future or there won't be any dairy farming to produce the war  for victory

if army officials put as much stress on seeing that there is some system about keeping latrines warm and hot water for shaving + bathing purposes as they do military courtesy, also try to be a little more prompter with their post of job when men are called out on the double, the men as a whole would be a lot better satisfied

outfits_comment: i dont now.
long: i thak the army is ok. in most averything
some of these questions were kind of difficulty to answer in my idea

outfits_comment: cant be mixed to-gather as they have a very bad body odor
long: i notice as a soldier +after being in three camps, the town i visit are all out to get the soldiers money. the charge top  + more also in there strange towns of people see to dislike a soldier. you take a soldier coming from the north to the south as i did find theses people on the south dislike us on account of the war. they seem as though they dont like to waite on us when we go in to by some  and when we do get it we pay for it. i think the president should do something about the  +the people of the south

outfits_comment: to avoid jealousy
long: buses shouldn't't be seen by company or driven by civilians there should be army buses for soldiers going places where we could go to movies mp should not be so strict toward army soldiers, for we are serving this country same as they are. if you ask me mp are lazy as hell soldiers should be free on transportation anywhere he goes

outfits_comment: i wouldn't want to be in with any negro.
long: i think it isn't more than fair that volunteers should get into the branch they choose. in my case i did not't get what i wanted and liked best and i think its not fair at all.
the only thing i have to comment on is to help the nergros where they belong in an out of the army at all times in

outfits_comment: i believe they will work better together
long: i believe every soldier should be given a chance to express his own abilities and why he thinks he could do better in something he would rather do. blouse's are a little too tight a outfit, and shoes should be fitted better.

i hope whoever's idea it was to build double-deck wood bunks with no springs in our camp is now sleeping on one. from what i have seen of nergros it is best to keep them on there place. i think if it is possible men should be put in the branch of service they like best. they would much better soldiers than they are now because they would be more interested. some figure they are not interested and just waste their time.

outfits_comment: it eliminate argument
long: men while in the united states should get there furloughs when due to them. and i think that they should have sat and sundays off

the fellows that are  should stay in that is if they are healthy and are not married. but if they are married, they should be let go and get a job in a defense plant to help the u.s.a. men should get there furloughs when they apply for one this deal of waiting then you may get shipped and be

outfits_comment: they fight better when among their own race.
long: every man has a very good chance of promotion and most of them take good advantage of it. don't know so much about treatment in towns with law officers and mp for the reason i haven't had a furlough long enough to be in one.

why can't we have springs in our bunks instead of boards it very hard to sleep at night when you haven't go a spring to sleep on maybe your the gentleman that can help us. how about it pal? for me and 400 others also?
could do with spring beds
i  really want to thank the army it made me happy. so this prove i like it swell here in the army.

outfits_comment: same as in question 60
long: it is a good idea, and it is a good chance to find out what is the matter with the morale in certain camps such as in this camp

i think the army is falling down on the job when they have healthy young men on k.p. for 4 months at a time if they are intelligent enough and are capable of doing something that is more beneficial. he is just wasting his time and talent.

i have been at this camp for approximately 3 weeks. there seems to be no system or organization. the training i am receiving is a repetition of my basic clerical training. there is nothing that so much as resembles morale among the men. the bunks are double, made of hard wood with no springs, and the barracks has about double the specified number of men sleeping there. we have no recreational facilities within 1 1/2 miles of our station. our only consolation is, that we have swell officer on the whole.

i believe i could do more out side of the army at my age than i can in the army because i was a farmer before coming in the army that all i now to do i can raise more stuff, than i am doing the army any good.
why do soldiers always have to wait and wait in line so long for everything. why don't they do something about it. get a system.
i think these questionnaires are a waste of time, money and effort

i am a soldier that for the first six months that i was in the army i done 4 months of steady kitchen police. i do think it is unfair to a soldier for it does not give him a chance to better himself. the boys that were doing k. p. with me had 1.8. test ranging from 160 to 147 so you can figure it out just how much chance he has to better himself

i was doing k.p. steady for 5 months at my old camp & for no reason at all. why? it wasn't for punishment. the last month is the only one that was changes my opinion of the army, which i like very much, & enjoy working these.
a very good cross-section of questions for the man in the ranks to express himself.

outfits_comment: by all means. there is lots of friction between negro & whites here
long: i think negro should be in a separate camp. & there should be more discipline in some camps.

from what i can see in the army, certain soldiers enjoy actions which to my mind are not rightly deserved wheras certain other soldier who actually know more and do more are nothing but buck privates simply because the tables of organization calls for a certain number of non coms, and the commanding officers do not like to break one man and give the rating over to another one who rightly deserves it. i dont say this other man actually doesn't deserve his rating but i cant see why his him holding a non coms rating should interfere with another soldier getting a rating simply because the t/o does not call for such a rating if a soldier deserves a rating he should be given it to my way of thinking

outfits_comment: different races can't agree. i'm a southerner too -
long: in my past two yrs. of army experience i find majority of commissioned officers unfair and trying to make conditions as uncomfortable for enlisted men as possible because they have a little authority. i am here to do my part but to create a bunch of enemies amung my own people and have them think i too would try to drive them and make conditions miserable for them i'll be an enlisted man and do as i am told. it is the enlisted man who is praying for the duration & six months. it is my desire to end this war and return to civilian life in peace.
i would like to get this war over soon as possible
i. q. tests should not be given the 2nd day after induction. they should be given after basic training is completed.
i filled out our question just the way i see & feel about it at present.

outfits_comment: we all have a job to do, so why should the white people discriminate the colored.
long: i am in the ordnance department of this service. i go to the shop every day except sunday and i do my level best to do my share. but it seems to me that the majority of the men come from the south and they still have the feeling that the civil war is still on. i personally feel a thought like that is stupid. these men absolutely do not help to cooperate with me, because they have the stupid feeling that if i learn anything i will get stripes before they do. incidents like these won't win this war. i am an american and i want to win this war, and i am more than willing to help anyone.

33 yes i believe there will be another war unless we clean up germany and japan and italy for keeps lets not have peace unless its for keeps lets not stop because they surrender lets fix them so they won't be able to fight again

in questions 24 i answer that what i do is worthwhile. that is most times. but when they put a man of 40 yrs and 25 yes in the automobile trade on k.p. then it is not worthwhile. then again after 5 months i am still a private and no hopes for a rating. so in question 32 i put undecided for the reason above if the army only wants me as a private then i would be better off back at my old job which was in charge of a fleet of 60 trucks and 38 troibes

outfits: ['They should be together in the same outfits']

long: the segregation of black & white tends to break the unity  of our peoples. this unity is essential for complete victory.  i feel that the classification of soldiers is arbitrary. true, it is hard to classify millions of men & take individual differences into account. an effort may be made however for reclassification after basic training. company commanders should give men that chance.
i would like to know why this questionnaire so many thinks to do and why did they pick on us only.

outfits_comment: they are human and are fighting the same war as we are

long: in camp pickett the nearest town to camp is blackstone, va. the people here simply rob the soldiers. for instance from blackstone to richmond is about sixty miles, taxis get as high as fifty dollars to take us there, that is six soldiers. another example is restaurants charge at least twice as much for their food. i think the government should work out some sort of ceiling prices for  stores, etc, in towns near army camps.

outfits_comment: many white people have no use for the negro and would prevent riots.

outfits_comment: the negro should stay in their own outfit because of their race.
long: the whites should always be separate from the negro because we are more interested in everything in the united states. the negro just thinks of a square meal & a place to eat. he doesn't seem to care to advance as fight as hard as we do.

i think that a ration of 9 out of 10 non-coms & 5 out of 6 officers are swell. the other one thinks too much his stripes or bars. the officers are usually 1st & 2nd lieutenants. this is usually due to the fact that they don't know how to handle men properly or get the proper cooperation from each one.

i believe that peace should be declared now as the longer the war last the more bitter each side will become. i don't believe the average soldier wants to fight. why should one solder want to shoot a soldier he has never seen before! we are to easily led by a fanatic then by common sense and the bible.

i think it is a very good idea about this questionnaire. it ought to help the people and soldiers during and after the war.

outfits_comment: yes because of the disliking of many whites and negro
long: the non-coms are very good to  up till the first sergeant he is no good. i also don't like the idea when we go on sick call every hour we miss we make up 2 at night in the kitchen. also our p.x. is not very nice and is too far away from our company. i don't like the train connections when going home on a week-end pass or furlough. i think when a soldier is sick but not sick enough for the hospital he should be given a slip showing that he should stay in bed all the time because when doing regular work he just gets worse and ends up with pneumonia or something.

outfits_comment: i think mixture would eventually bring friction.

i believe this questionnaire is one of the best idea to express your opinion without being afraid of having shit detail every time you open. why don't have them more often and give us our chance to tell you what we think. you would understand the need of the soldier better. i hope we have more of these

long: i think a soldier should be stationed near home if he isn't sent with duty overseas in my opinion that is the main complaint. being away from loved ones. in some parts of the country we have nothing to do. the town is too small & the people, especially in the south are against the soldier from the north. instead of being proud they look down on the soldier. in town the prices are about twice as much as they would ordinarily cost transportation to a large city is terrible. instead of 8 hours to get home by train it takes about 14 so we have about 8 hours here once every two months.
i like the army but i would have rather joined the navy at least i would have had a better chance and gotten a better job in the navy.

outfits_comment: there is a distinction between us and they are greasy

outfits_comment: all men are equal regardless of color creed or religion

outfits_comment: i don't care very well to sleep with negro soldiers.
long: well i believe it a good idea to have the questionnaire to get a soldiers opioun of what he thinks of the army and just what his chances are. i happened to build ship's in civilian life and i liked my job so i tried for the air corp's ground crew because i wanted to work on motor's, and i also worked in a machine shop, and they put me in the medical corps. i also had an orchestra of my own and thought a lot of it, and i like music very much. so when i entered the army i wanted to get into the army band, i've inquired for 3 week's but no one will help me. that's why i'm not satisfied with my outfit i'm not interested in my work.

this pamphlet is a good idea if what we say is put to good use. another thing why so many questions on the negro. you would think that the negro situation is a very important item that the army is trying to control. perhaps it is - there should be more questions on beneficial suggestions from the men to our company commanders. all defense  have realized this and quite a few ideas have been brought forth. we should adopt the same policy in our own battalions.

i don't have any comments about this questionnaire. all i want is to pray to god and every body pray that this war will soon be over. i am trying to do my part and live right so that god will let me reach back home some day to my mother and father and my girl friend which will be my wife. this is my pray i pray.

outfits_comment: i think that most white people like myself dont want to be around them.

long: at camp pickett here someone should do something about getting the railroad to run trains more often. boys living in new york have to pay $15.00 to get to washington and besides pay train fare to n.y. the only reason i would want to leave this camp is because of transportation. the railroad co. could very easily run right into camp. so that the boys could get home on a weekend pass.

outfits_comment: suppose a negro soldier were made an c.o. a white would not like to take his orders.

outfits_comment: because i don't think as a whole, negro's intelligents is as high as a white person.

as i see it the army doesn't give you much chance for recreation. maybe it is because i haven't been in the army very long so i may be very much wrong. i do think though we should get a pass or a few days of of furlough each month if your work and other elements are satisfactory. certainly not if not giving your best. i've been doing all that i can to do things right in the army but feel my loyalty isn't being returned justly. i will be here for my basic training for 11 weeks. a 3 day pass could get me home for a short time. certainly, if i try my best i should be entitled to a furlough or pass for at least 3 days. after all my parents should be granted the privilege to see their sons at times. any person with reasoning can tell how a person feels if he tries. to do things right and then isn't being treated fairly. certainly i know we must have discipline and order to have an excellent army but should be granted privileges when deserving. i have been in the army for a month. i hardly have time to write a few letters. certainly, we should be given sufficient time for that. this may be only with my basic training but i hope that it is better after that. i like the army very much. i like the different ways of training but it seems as though my free time isn't ample.

the questionnaire is a fairly complete quiz. -- this outfit is fairly good but could be improved quite a bit. from personal observance, here are a few bad conditions -1- in order to cut down sick call the b.c.  gives all that make sick call 2 hrs extra duty at night. -2- saturday afternoon inspections. the men work long hours carrying out strenuous duties during the week, and then the b.c. has an inspection at 2 or 2:30 sat afternoon -3- the b.c. does not have confidence in his non-coms or any one else. he is supreme and must figure out each little move for himself. this reflects all the way down to the lowest yard bird and results in dis harmony. 4- another point is that the non-comm ratings are not handed out around here on ability. if you have the right home address you are ok. this not only goes for my outfit but the whole .

outfits_comment: too much commotion

long: will have a damn butting commander that is not worth anything to the boys. we catch hell for every little thing we do. boys get sick & go to the med. when they came back, he gives them extra duty, & our passes we have a time getting passes, & all the boys hates him just like i do.  boys  to make something but know he just is not worth a damn. he does not know how to handle men. he thinks his doing them good, but just doing  bad. the whole battion knows an boys in war butley catches hell.

outfits_comment: we would not want a negro sgt or lieutenant. capt or what not to give us white order
