i think they should have more furlough for soldiers. i think this would decrease the no. of a.w.o.l's. before every man is sent across he should have a furlough.

outfits_comment: desecration in the ranks
long: basic training in the p.a. is 13 weeks at the end of bassic. i think ever soldier should get a furlough if they did it would curt a walls too smaller percentage, 2f2 couldn't season it out stut 2 i be caught did try it myself. but how many other boys that haven't had their basic trainee i will do it  will prove i think . what do you think? why send me halfway across the states and the boys form here to my home i thought you changed that policy. you said you did anyway.

outfits_comment: keep in separate outfits. no chance for racial discontentment.
long: no comments except men should be classified according to what they did on the outside where ever possible. it would save a lot of time & expenses & cut down the taxes we soldier will have to pay after this war is over.
the questionnaire is a good thing but i believe we should get a furlough after our basic training.

i am a mechanical minded and handy man with tools. i had work with my tools all my life. but they put me in the field artillery where i have no chance at all of displaying my natural ability. i am sure i could do lots more for the army and myself in a job dealing with the use of tools etc. i like to work at these type of jobs and i like to work hard because i am very interested. in the artillery here we don't work very hard as instruction and i am not interested in "teaching school". the best rating i can get is a sgt here so the future is not too bright.

this questionnaire is a good idea. i think that every soldier should have at least a ten day furlough plus traveling time after their basic training is over. this would cut down on the number of awol cases + give every soldier something to look forward to during his basic.

outfits_comment: same as for question 60
long: the biggest objection i have to my army training is that is not hard enough. we should be given more practice in firing, both the howitzers and the lighter arms. physical training should be emphasized more

outfits_comment: the negro seem to work well together
long: i feel that i haven't had a fair chance to do the gunners job on the 105 howitzer. our physical conditioning has not been thorough due to the older men holding us back. i feel unimportant in my present job. the air corps would be my choice and i could be more completely satisfied in it.

outfits_comment: it's a good idea give every one a chance to express himself
long: its a good idea give every one  a chance to express himself.

as lincoln stated i believe every consideration should be given the negro but also quoting lincoln, i believe they shoudn't be allowed to eat or sleep with the whites but should stay as close to their own race as possible. of course they should be allowed the same political standing as the whites.

outfits_comment: i think the soldier should have that privilege at least while he is under arms.
long: a soldier should be stationed more closer to home than being thousand or so from home. if a soldier was to go home about every other weekend, the soldier would take much more interest in what he is doing and as a whole the battery or i should say the army would be much more better than now. there would be so many soldiers going a.w.o.l. and etc.

outfits_comment: i know they will not work together, so separately you will attain more from each
long: it seems that we are being used as guinea pigs, but the ideas derived from this questionnaire will be never given to the soldier. the army has changed their mind so often about small technicalities + overlooked the big things, that it shows in the training of our soldiers. i believe in some cases the soldier loses faith in the man behind it all + this should never be. i think our training should be complete + tough + also our food should be better. seriously the boys dont eat half their meals in the mess hall + consequently high prices prevail in towns close to army camps.

outfits_comment: most individual in the army fells the man next to him is as good as he is.
long: i think that in some cases limited service men are of more value in production where they had been producing food and agricultural products prior to induction to army, than placed on some job or cadry. as a general rule lack of enthusiasm in such work in the army causes a bad mood and concensious feeling. most men who are in limited service had some line of work where there handicaps did not't bother them. i feel that most limited service men feel out of place in the army, where they are associated with men who are more active and are able to make faster and more noticed gains. the average limited service man feels very much out of place and is subject to much talk amongst his men therefore making him a very poor leader.
something certainly ought to be done about this "damned" goat and mutton we have to eat, it's making to many vegatarians here.

outfits_comment: they do better work together

outfits_comment: because there are many white soldiers who would not like to be with negro.

i thin it is very good, it gives a man a will to say what he thinks.

24 - i think too much time is spent on military courtesy. hours spent on teaching a man just how to stand and exact words to use in speaking to commissioned officers. how to place a bar of soap on a bed (inspection). a commissioned officer can give a man hell for an hour and even if the man is in the right he can say or explain nothing in his defense. it is pretty hard for a man who has been treated like an equal person in earning his living for 20 years to be treated as just another number by comm. officers

outfits_comment: they couldn't get along in groups.
long: negro desire too much right above the white race when they are together in groups and have little or no respect for the ordinary soldier who tries to cooperate with them. the army keeps changing their rules too often for any common soldier such as allowing furloughs, because the group here before us got furloughs and when they came back they make it impossible for the group following. some officers continually treat individuals like they would a hateful child or dog.

i'm sure all of us soldiers are trying to do our best, with a fair . but i see that my  are looking forward to advancements, and are not given a fair chance. that is for example if a soldier likes to be in an other division of the service he can't get a transfer to what he likes. i would like to be closer home if not, i would like to go to a school where a soldier could have a lot more. the food is not so good, especially when they feed you mutton three or four days out of a week.

outfits_comment: negro soldiers would tend to have discrepacies against white officers & ncos & vice versa
long: i think this is a very good idea, if the comments & answers bear any weight. i do think that if the average soldier were given a short time to be home before going to actual combat he would make a more confidant fighter. i have noticed that when a soldier finds out that there is no possibility of a furlough his morale & spirit is very much lower for a considerable length of time. the towns in surrounding areas by army camps should be watched closer on price ceilings. i believe that there is a lot of unjustified profiteering going on near all army camps.

outfits_comment: for same reasons as stated before
long: question 27 = i do not believe everyone is given an even chance for promotions. there is some that are favored than others

outfits_comment: most white people cannot get along with negro.

there are certain foods that are being rationed from the civilians, for the benefit of the soldiers, if they give up those things cheerfully, why don't we get more then them? i think the army kitchens could be kept a lot cleaner, also the barracks, and instead of a drinking faucet in the latrines, operated by the hands. a faucet operated by the foot, could stop diseases, because everybody's hand touches the faucet.

outfits_comment: they will make better teams if they're not together.
long: this questionnaire is o.k. if there is something done about the problems of soldiers that now exist.

long: 1. excellent questionnaire, but you will have trouble tabulating data from comments. 2. relation of officers to men, and effects of the methods of the officers on psychology of the men would bear investigation. 3. training methods used would bear investigation, though perhaps that should be done by psychologists and not by questionnaire technique. 4. you might study reasons for men being upset or unhappy. 5.  methods used in dealing with homesickness and home worries would bear study.

outfits_comment: the only comments i have to make deals with the negro race. i come from a large city over run with negro, they ruin any part of it they settled in, they are hard to get along with, it is not safe to be in there presents most of them have criminal intent it may be they do not have the same chance in life the white man has, i don't know i for one want to live apart from them
long: the only comment i have to make deals with the negro . i come from a large city over run with nogros, they are hard to get along with, it is not too  to be in there  most of them have  intents, it may be they do no have the same chance in life the white man has, i don't know i for one want to live apart from them
each soldier should be able to be in the branch of service he wants most and have a fair choice of camp.
if i could take care of my family on army pay i would like to say in army for building a good army to keep anyone from trying anything again
pertaining to colored people, i really don't know there problems, well enough.

outfits_comment: the same for 63 as for 60
long: well sir, i think you asked us everything. but i always wondered why a soldier when he is drafted should be stationed so far from his home. thats the whole trouble with being in the army. right this minute as i'm writing this, i'll do almost anything to be in a camp near my home. i know it will make me a better soldier. you don't know who i am, but i think this will go for every boy in the army.

outfits_comment: because there will be more cooperation that way.
long: the question as to whether or not i will be better able to secure a job after war is difficult to answer. in some cases you will be better able to, in other cases it will be more difficult to get a job. in my own case, as a canoneer i don't see how that can possibly be of any value to me in civilian life after the war.

outfits_comment: i wouldn't like to be in an outfit with negro, it's another race.

the question as to whether or not i will be better able to set  after the war is difficult to answer.

outfits_comment: they can work better together and also the whites can work better together.
long: i don't know what the idea is of not having the soldier put his name down but it seems to me that by having a person write his name down he would  feel that he had said what he had wanted to and that someone, wherever looks these over, would know the man's name and if he had more questions to ask could call him and be cleared up and also find out more fully what was on the man's mind.  all and all as for on these survey's go i hardly think that any man in the army is getting too  raw a deal and that by far we have the best and most contented army in the world.

outfits_comment: be cause they think they are better
long: i think this questionnaire gives a man the right to do his talking the way he wants to do

outfits_comment: white and black never mix it would lead to trouble, and an outfit should work somothly together
long: i would like to stay in the army because it is something i have always wanted but could not get in account of eyesight. i believe in peacetime it is the  and the most healthful life a man could get if he doesn't mind taking orders. i like the way the survey was conducted. i felt free to say what i thought.

outfits: ['They should be together in the same outfits']
outfits_comment: i'd say whites 70% negro 30%. they'd fight better interspersed than separate. i mean in actual combat. non-combat, keep 'em separate.
long: this is a darn good questionnaire. i hope you can use the results to the army's good advantage. i'm  that this time, in this war, the administration is sincerely trying to do all possible to put our intelligent, hard fighting army in the field.  entering the army, i  at the interest and ? shown in the treatment of the brick private. i hope this questionnaire is not put out by the war department just to keep office workers busy and that they pile these up in the basement and forget them. i'm sure, however, that mr.  is sincere about this.

outfits_comment: think that the mixture of classes of men that we have in general service could not get along together with negro.
long: on the whole the questionnaire is pretty good although i do not think it covers enough to get a man's full opinions, views, reactions & thoughts. very good as far as it goes. men in the army are not in my opinion are not chosen & fitted carefully enough for jobs they are best fitted & interested in. training centers should put more effort into fitting an individual into a field that he is interested in, on the  which he has tendencies to bear toward. it is true that the army cannot allow everyone to choose his own branch of the service but they should be more careful in placing the individual in a secondary choice of positions.

outfits_comment: there seems to be an unusual amount of lost motion in the army. for instance, we finished our basic training after 10 weeks yet we had to stay around for 3 weeks more doing very little before those of us could go to o.c.s. or the others be shipped out. another group of me could have been in and had 3 weeks of training behind them by this time. seems like a lot of time has been wasted.
long: there seems to be an unusual comount of lost motion in the army. for instance we finished our basic training after 10 weeks. yet we had to stay around for 3 weeks more doing very little before those of us could go to o.c.s. or the others be shipped out. another group of men could have been in and had 3 weeks of training behind them by this time. seems like a lot of time has been wasted.
my comment is that we trust in the  great god pray and win the complete victor over the end he will help. i am praying for us all  love

in my humble opinion the army has been handled as well as possible under the circumstances ‚äì the only improvement i can see is that we should do more fighting & less talking ‚äì¬†such as this questionnaire. no leader should base his military decisions on public opinion but rather the job at hand & for gods sake lets get to work & get this job done & work out social (such as negro) & practical problems when we win the war. the wasted effort & money in this questionnaire would run the rushans out of africa. seriously lets get to work & cut out this unnecessary stuff.

outfits: ['They should be together in the same outfits']

long: our orientation lectures included this statements. "the doctrine of manifest destiny must be revived in regard to central and south america. poster throughout the camp proclaim "we alone are capable of dictating the terms of a peace these statements seem to me to be the things we are fighting against. why if we are fighting for equal rights for all peoples are we taught these things?
what i want most is to get to be a sgt. and go overseas. i believe that there are too many old fellow's in the army. it take's young men to fight the war that we are in this time

i don't quite get the significance of many of the questions. i'm sure that i would understand if i were informed. i do appreciate, however, my countries  effort to find out our opinion on various subjects.

i believe the classification section of the army is very wrong. there are to many cases of men not being put in the branch of the army where they could do where they could do their best & be happy. they have finance & quartermaster schools for officers; & men with university degrees in finance & commerce can't get in. they would rather let them do labor where no brains are necessary at all. these remarks above are my own experience having received 115 on my i.q. test.
in combat there should be five or ten negro fighting together with 100 white men. keep an eye on russia.
i really think that it gives the soldier a chance to express his opinions clearly and fairly

outfits_comment: because that way they could work better
long: i think it's a very good idea & any good idea gotten from them should be followed

outfits_comment: i have no dislike for the negro, but i believe they work better among themselves
long: i think we have a great army but the men don't receive the amount of training that they should get. i think myself they should have at least three years at the most. of course i understand that we haven't the time and are able to turn out good soldiers quicker than other nations, but we are given a lot to learn in a few months and it is rather hard to remember in that time. i myself haven't had very much gas masked training and think more should be given. the time taken up for inspections should be used in trainning
i haven't any proticualr things to say.

outfits_comment: i do not think very much about the negro
long: i do not now very much about the army and dont say much of it i think it is a good army?

outfits_comment: it is all in what you get used to.
long: not about this particular one but. why do they discriminate the japanese-americans. why are they denied to fight for what anyone else in the army is fighting for. why aren't they eligible to apply for aviation cadet training, or officer candidate schools. ‚äì why do they keep them in the army as non-combatant soldier's this to me is very un-democratic. they have as much to lose as any one else and many are highly educated and qualified for such opportunities.

outfits_comment: most white men like to sleep and eat with whites, rather than negro.
long: in my opinion, the army life is alright. civilians treat us fairly good. i am contented because the boys in our outfit are just like brothers. we all complain as a whole. our officers and men are shifted so much we don't have chance to learn much. men are in our outfit who shouldn't't be here. they only hinder us. to many men kiss asses for their rating, while other, less conservative men who have ability, lose faith in the army and don't give a damn. as a result we have a lot of good men lost in the pile. we have a bunch of gold briggers and ass kissing non-coms, showing off their day old stripes. the officers conduct to many needless inspections, and are shifted around to much to be of any aid to the men under them. only men with brains should run the army. not ones with loud mouths.

outfits_comment: not to mind with white.

outfits_comment: it is all right for negro to be in the same outfit. for they have separate barracks to themselves.
long: the quicker the war is over & i get to go back home the better i will be satisfied, i am a married man, been married six years & have a good home. but i am very willing to do my part in winning this war, and i am going to try to make as good as soldier as possible why i am in the army.
i have nothing against the negro but he should be kept in his place.

outfits_comment: because there will be less arguments among them.

long: i dont think there are any comments i like the army swell they have good meals an a good place to sleep an some of the soldiers are very nice fore i dont care i like them all an i don't care what the people said about the army i still think its swell.

most men develop in the training period an inferiority complex - this would be corrected in a psychological method, for it is a handicap in the fighting as well as a definite diminishing withing factor, spec if this war should last for a long time  a soldier should be placed in the field, where he knows something about + where in this line a definite interest absorbs him - in my observation a poorly done job is done by soldiers put on a job where he had no idea nor interest - even by honest effort his work was done maybe satisfactorly but our country lost a great deal of value, for in his field + interest the effort + accomplishment + efficiency would have been doubled.  there is a great deal of lack in commandery, this should be cultivated before the damage on the battlefield teaches the soldier this valuable a spirit holder ss

outfits_comment: unaccustomed to living with negro. i would not want to.
long: i think the negro should have the same rights and privileges as the whites, but they should have there own companies, pl and service clubs. the average white man does not want to live and mingle with the negro. there should be a race distinction; if not i think the army will have trouble with its soldiers.

outfits_comment: lots of white soldiers do not like negro.
long: i think this is a very good idea letting each and every soldier know how he feels.

i think we should have a little better  than we have had.
questionnaire is a waste of taxpayers money.

in my camp at the hospital the negro and whites are all together.

there should be something done about the bus service to keep the highways from being crowded with soldiers here at camp soldiers have to wait in line some times for from 1 to 5 or 6 hours to get on a bus and some are not able to get one and
i am serious about these strikers to many people are not serious enough about this war. they are thinking of their selves not the nation & trying to beat to many rationed items do some are selfish.

would like to have a little more time to my self, and a little freedom. i do think that on a weekend when a soldier is not on any special detail he should be free to leave the camp grounds, so long as he can be back in time for his duties. also think that a furlough for about weeks out of every three months would bring up the soldier morale

outfits_comment: there would be more battles there anything else between themselves.
long: why is it with all the wheat in the this country the boys do no enough bread at the table that a shame.  we should clean up european countries meaning germany and japan italy, let never get in power again so their would be peace. get this war won soon as possible.  why don't they put a guy where could do his best, not where does not like at all always kicking about some there noncom officers do not trust the boys and seen all over then i don't see that, treat men good get helluva more out of them, than always kicking about them.

outfits_comment: i never saw black and white men get along together
long: the only comments i have to mack is life itself is up to the  him self.
if the government kept families on w.p.a. before the war why can't the keep them now and release these fellows for the service. they are no better than i am.

the army is all right but not for married men because they have not got there hearts on what they are doing and you can't have your mind on your home and wife and the army to. it doesn't work. they ought to let the married men stay home and work and let these single kids take over but if we ever do go cross we would win this war or die  fighting for our country
i think that there are enough single men out of the army to take married men place. they shouldn't't draft men with children. and leave single men out

outfits_comment: to keep from constant quarrels and contention which is always bound to arise
long: from my observation and my own ideas i think the biggest single asset in keeping up the soldiers morale is amusements, musical programs, dances etc. also as many passes and leaves as militarily possible especially to those who maintain a high standard and return to camp in high spirits and ready for any duty. not to much freedom for those that do not or cannot appreciate the advantages of passes and leaves and conduct themselves accordingly.  to me and many others the service clubs, uso' etc. are the brightest spots for the service en. lets have more of them, much larger ones where more satisfactory dances etc. can be held and more girls to come more near to a balance of the sexes.  would also suggest more music of all types at service clubs so that boys with ability could enjoy themselves with real music. there is too much canned jive and stuff of the jukebox type. and lastly please lets have at least 40 or 50% of of  dance music smooth and melodious in place of the awful din of the almost perpetual jive.

outfits_comment: there are not enough broadminded people and understanding people to mix the two groups. best effort is  when all races work as individual units.
long: the army is a great and new adjustment for most men entering. it must stick to its regulations and discipline above all, eliminating those which are too impractical and unnecessary. most men want to work; they want to work to get this job over, but they like to see the fruits of their efforts or a reason for them. give them that opportunity and much more progress will be made. another important fact is having the feeling that the people are behind you. by people i mean civilians. much can be done along that line, all in all, the army has its good points along with the bad ones. naturally you cannot compare too many things with your civilian life. different scales are used in measuring your happiness.

i think you should have a question asking the souldier what branch of service he would be better outfit. some of the boys in my outfits do a lot of good in different outfits but here they aren't doing so good. i am only a p.f.c. and a lot of fellows ask me if i could see about getting a change of jobs for them.

in regard to question 48- if we were able to make a satisfactory peace we should do so. "unconditional surrender" would take too long and be far too costly. i think it's high time that the government looked at war from the standpoint of the individual and the life he wants to lead rather than from the standpoint of "glory" and "honor".
as far as i have seen, there is too much favoritism showed in the army. they too often put stripes on men who do not deserve them, but who happen to be tactful enough to get themselves recommended.

outfits_comment: negro as a whole do not have the same outlook on sanitation as the white people.
long: in my opinion the army is unfair to married men who have their wive living near camp. they allow you out only three nights a week and on those nights half of the time the commanding officer may have some foolish thing that he thinks must be done right now. i think every man stationed in the u.s. should be allowed to be free from "retreat' to "reville" unless some special problem came up.  they also have a habit of stressing unimportant things and sliding over important things.  we will never have a real army when they insist on doing unimportant or unnecessary things during the time the man is supposed to be free.

outfits_comment: i think they should give stripes to those men that it does not go to his head about them and not to those that play's foxcuts and the ones that deserves them.

outfits_comment: because of sanitation

i'm contended and happy to be in the army. it has a great field of education. it has made me realize many things i did not't even dream of. of course you don't take to it at first. but as you go along many things look clear to you. yes sir! the army alright that my honest opinion

outfits_comment: they do not mix well living together and therefore should not be in the same outfits.
long: men over 35 should not have to compete physically with boys of 20 + 21. the army should not place a man in a young mans outfit just because his ability to do some job is needed. he should have a job (of which there are thousands done by young men) where he could have some physical comfort and not get up every morning more tired than he went to bed.  don't try to make a division of 95% draftees and 5% volunteers. most draftees are dissatisfied and the morale is low.  have noncoms made by competitive exams and not on recommendation of some b.c. who knows little or nothing of his men individually.

well i would like to go back on the form because that i know all about, and that comes first. wouldn't be for the farmer we wouldn't be here. i think they should let the farm boys go back and farm and if they really need them then they can go back but a farmer should be on a farm.

outfits_comment: we don't have the same ways of living and that wouldn't work at all.
long: well as for myself i have gotten my highest rank in the job i am at. i have tried to be transferred to another job in the same outfit, where a little hard work one could obtain a higher grade. and we are also short of men to fill these jobs, and it is the kind of work i would like. my job in combat reminds me of a score keeper at ball game. because that is just about all that i really do. since i am in this great army, i want to do my job and get this struggle over. i can't see why i must stay at a stand still when i could be put where they need men, and then have a chance to do a real job, plus also the possibilities of getting some place.

outfits_comment: i don't really know
long: (this is my honest opinion of this corruption) first the men were not given a chance at the induction center. phisical or mental examinations were not closely given. when in the army if you don't outfit in with the non-come or officers you won't get anywhere. when you see you can do a better job in another branch of service or company they won't listen to you when you ask to be changed. the meals and excersise are not properly given. the extra details are not necessary in many cases. i also can see many jewish boys still hanging around the corners in civilian life whereas their location should be in the army and the few that are in holds the best jobs. there is a lot of underhand work going on which must be stopped or will end up in a personal war in this country.

outfits_comment: there is bound to be discord, and negro would not have the chance that white persons would.
long: in a combat outfit as i am in there should be more spirit. if anything breaks down morale in an outfit its the everlasting griping and harping on subordinate and petty matters that can easily be overlooked. americans will fight as individual and original citizens. when the army tries to alter them too much they lose all self confidence and spirit. if we are to fight like machines let's change to the other side, but if we are going to think for ourselves give us half a chance to do so.

i think that old men and young men should not be in the same outfits. old men can not keep up with young men physicily and it hurts an older man's morale to have to be an object of pity by the younger men

outfits: ['They should be in separate outfits', "It doesn't make any difference"]
long: this is nothing to do after retreat no place to go

outfits_comment: i think white soldiers use their heads more.
long: i have answered these questions to the best of my ability and understand each and every question. the army is a great organization and i am proud to be a part of it. i think the army gives every soldier a good chance to show what he can do and for my self i am doing my best to be a good soldier and i think my job as a cook, is one of the important job in the army. i think most of the soldiers in my btry think the same i. the army is o.k.

outfits_comment: for the best interest
long: men over 38 should not be in the army because it pretty hard on a man the age he can't complete with the younger one in hike, and double time and the conditioncourse are to tough for him men over 38 should not be in the army because it really had on a man the age he can t compete with the younger one in hike, and double time and the circumstances combined are too much for him.

outfits_comment: because a negro, is not socially equal to a white man!!!!!!!!!

some of the commissioned officers are too young to give the proper orders to non-coms who have been in the service for some time. i haven't been able to procure men for my section for quite some time, even though i spoke to the officer in charge. the work came down upon 4 of us just the same, where others had 12. the transportation is very poor. couldn't get out on weekends in time.

outfits_comment: if they are good enough to lose their lives they should be treated equally.
long: i think this questionnaire gives the enlisted man a good chance to tell what he thinks of the army.

outfits_comment: they have a different way of living and different ideas than the white

outfits_comment: the men can work better with their own  color.
long: about pushing out much service. i put the air corp because i worked around greasing engine, trucks, etc. and i would like get in the air corp ground crew service because i would be more interesting in air corp ground crew than i am now in field artillery. because the work is more in my line and was in civilian life. about the negro i don't know much about negro from here because they came from all over country.
would like to get a furlough to go home, but seven days, which they give you does not give you enough time for traveling and enjoying yourself. the distance i have to go is spent in train and buses.

outfits_comment: because they would not get along together.
long: this is about the last part of the questionnaire. i think that all negro soldiers should be in a   to stop all fighting among the white soldiers.

i would be better satisfied if i could get a furlough once in awhile. i've been here about four months and i haven't had any furloughs. they are giving out furloughs now but are picking out certain ones and are letting them go home that lives near here and they should let the ones that can't go home over the weekend go home. when i come in the army i asked for the air force but did not't get it. i like to work on machery any kind of motors. they are to strict.

outfits_comment: most of the negro you can't get along with.
long: i think this is a very good think for a solder to tell what the think.

outfits_comment: we have a mixed m.p. unit and it is no good!

i feel that a man from 30 yr up if any good at all, is a well trained mechanic in some line, and could better help the successful completion of the war, working in a defense plant, because in a combat outfit a man past 30 can not adapt himself to army life as easily as a younger man, also most of them have some kind of business and other things back at home that keep his mind only half, on what he is doing

outfits_comment: let them be separate co. then put them on the front
long: and see just how much they will fight for our country. they might even win the war. then give them credit. most of them can't even write. why take a boy that has a good education and kill him. put the negro up first. .28 i would be better at home with my wife & baby. i could work on the p.rr. which they need men real bad. i have also had 9 yrs experience. i could also buy war bonds and would be better satisfied.

outfits_comment: the average negro is reckless about his cleanliness.
long: i think that in selecting a noncom officer, the character as well as army service should be looked into. the commissioned officers are more "heels" than superior officers - the fact that wearing a bar or leaf on their soldier doesn't make them too good to speak or mix with privates of the u.s. army.

outfits_comment: i think this questionnaire is a good thing if is used the right way.
long: i think this questionnaire is a good thing it is used the right way.

this questionnaire is a very good idea, because it gives a soldier a chance to express his honest opinion about the army and there will be n o one to give him co. company punishment for saying what he wants to say.

outfits_comment: because they would fight harder if they were alone.
long: why did not't it mention about income tax. i rightfully don't think a soldier should pay. this country is too rich to ask money from a soldier who don't know whether he will dead or alive in a day or more to come.

outfits_comment: in my outfit they are mixed, but the negro knows his place and stays in it.
long: i like the army very much, although at times it's ways and means don't seem entirely fair. i should like to become an officer (commissioned) for i feel that i'm capable of doing a better job as such. my present duty leaves much to be desired when it comes to helping win the war but it is important and i'm fairly well satisfied. i should like to make the army my career and am working toward that end. the army is an education in itself and service will never hurt anyone with any common sense. in short, the army is a fine and necessary thing and i'm mighty proud to be a part of it. my only regret is that i cannot affix my signature to this statement.

outfits_comment: they fight with white fellows & they get along together better
long: why isn't there more ratings in these outfits & why do most of the colored soldiers get all the ratings
i think some of the company comm, first sergeants, and noncoms should be looked into and see how the company is operated and investigate so much partiality being shown

i am a married man and my wife will have a baby almost any time now and i think a married man belongs on a defense job or farm so he can take care of his family and keep his mind on his work. personally i cant keep my mind on my work the way things are. i can't do any good when i dont know how my family is and am worried all the time and have my mind on them. i have been nearly struck by trucks and automobiles on many occassions while going along thinking and worrying about my family at home. i am trying to carry on through this thing so that we may be together again soon.
the questionnaire is quite complete, but i for one would like to hear a few of the arguments pro and con on a few of the subjects.
well what i want to know is why dont they put the awol on  duty or punish them more instead of the and that hasnt ever missed bed check or done any thing wrong

outfits_comment: white people don't belong with negro.
long: just keep the negro away from the white people and they will be

i am ready to go over seas and finish this war. if i had wanted to be a soldier i would have joined the army several years ago.

outfits_comment: some soldiers have it in for the negro soldiers, might try and pick them off.
long: i think the negro soldiers are doing there share to help win the war. there bus service here is very poor do to the fact they don't have the equipment.

questionnaire all right
in the army i am a truck driver which is something most every body can do, but at home there is lots of mechinery which i can run but not many can.

i believe the men should have more passess and privileges and all branches of the service should have the same. if the men had more time to themselves they would be better satisfied. this questionnaire would be alright if it would make any difference in conditions.

why was i called to take this test when i could have been doing much more important work such as drilling, etc.? time is short, let's get on the ball.

i have found in many instances that the army does not recognize leadership. i personally feel qualified to lead men as an officer. i would also like to work in the judge advocates' office, being an attorney in civilian life. by heresay hearsay, i understand it is difficult to get into o.c.s. officer candidate school or the judge advocate's office, knowing that if i did i would make good. the deserving man should get more consideration than he does get.

outfits_comment: then their will be no distinction of race or powers to push one another around

outfits: ['They should be together in the same outfits']
outfits_comment: since we are fighting for rights and freedom, i believe they should.
the reason is some white people do not get along with negro or vica versa
long: i do think the single men should be taken before married men. there are plenty of single fellows around.

i think they should take atlantic city and blow it up. we got tired as  every night. that it is now to give a man a sgt. rating when he has been in the army not 5 months there are men here i drilled 3 months ago and now they are my sgt.

outfits: ['They should be together in the same outfits']
outfits_comment: negro have higher spirits than whites should help morale a lot.
long: on this negro question, the civilian question, i was a foreman over a group of negro in defense plants + my departement was rated best and most productive in the plant. there are about 3000 whites & 200 negro. i am white.

outfits_comment: i think however that they might work better in a combined outfit
long: i think the person in charge of the physical education program here at atlantic city is out of his head. i was some what of an athlete before entering the army and considered my self in pretty good shape. instead of being physically outfit the men are being made physical wrecks. the most sleep i have ever gotten in one night is 7 hrs. and i go to bed as soon as i am permitted and as soon as i ready my equipment for the next day which is usually 9:pm 4:30 am we are up. this post is over run with colds & sore throats. this is what i attribute it to.

outfits_comment: for the good of the army they should be separated as it causes less friction especially amongst soldiers
long: though this is a b.t.c. i believe that the recruits are given too little free time. they do not have a free minute from 5 o'clock in the morning untik 7 or 8 at night. inspections should be held during a soldiers duty not on his free time. the recruits cannot wait until they are shipped out of atlantic city. i personally believe that if the training day were to be cut to 6 hrs the men would be more satisfied with their lot in the army. inspections are held twice weekly between 7 & 8 oclock. they could all be held saturday afternoon.

as far as cooperation between the men of our squadron it is very good but between the noncom officers and the men it is poor. they seem to rebuke one another's orders and the men take the blame for  failing to complete some order.
i think that new soldiers should get more training. they can't be to well trained. that the soldiers should have a lot to say about the settlement of the war.

i think this was a very good questionnaire to bring out your opinion on different things that come up on this quiz, another thing you could do was to bring out the point that you thought was right or wrong

outfits_comment: because a negro maybe doesn't like to be with us and would like to be with other negro.
there is a difference in their nerve i believe
long: i think we should get down to brass tacks instead of wasting so much precious time

outfits: ['They should be together in the same outfits']
outfits_comment: if separated each group would try to be better but this would cause jealousy and indifference.

long: most of the time in this army, if you want to get ahead its not how much you know, its who you know.
i think this a very good idea and the war department could find out as average soldier thinks of the army and find out more ideas that are interesting that will help the army as good as possible.

outfits_comment: they are fighting the same enemy as we are, why not fight together
to keep down disorders.
long: some men get ratings after going to one of the various army school while others do not. to me this seems very unfair. - the plans on training branch here is poorly organized. the men of the air force are not given enough combat training in fact they have a poor training system. the mail system is the best organized branch of the army. many men are not paid on time because of carelessness on their end the  dept past. it should be looked into. i think some means of having equipment disinfected at least once a month especially the gas mask. every man in the army should be taught fighting tactics of the enemy. he should have more milk to drink if it is possible to obtain. men going to o.c.s. should have at least 1 year army training before entering that school.

outfits: ['They should be together in the same outfits']
outfits_comment: but should be in separate quarters.

outfits_comment: explanation below.
long: question no. 9 is a good idea, but it should say for two years compulsory military training. that is what every boy and man needs, and also uncle sam. these questions about negro; i am very partial and one-sided about them. i do not like negro because of all my different associations with them in difference occasions.

outfits_comment: sometimes i'd substitute a considerate negro for an unconsideratewhite man.

apparently many non-coms are picked at random. in the army your achievements in the form of promotion are not decided by your ability but rather by the fact you are known. recruits often find the army hard. smart people realize that there must be stern discipline to develop a properly trained army, but many know the fault of confusions lies in the fact that the administrative personnel are untrained in leading and handling large groups of men. the greatest efficiency in training of men could be attained if administrative personnel were chosen with more care.

outfits_comment: let negro be in separate outfits so they can distinguish themselves

long: i think that have been put in the wrong branch as far as the work i have been assigned i am not suited for it because have no apptitude for it i worked with clothing and supplying men for over 2 years and would have fitted best in the quater master corps. we should also destroy japan as a nation completely and bomb their citys and civilian populations the same as they done to the chinese for years and we would have and end of this war very soon with these low sneaks.

outfits_comment: but when across we can fight side by side forget the race if the fight for u.s.
long: i'm just a casual at this post and doing nothing of importance to help the army while other trainees are shipped here a few months after myself and are shipped out ahead of me before they complete their basic training while mind has been completed. why do i waste the u.s. time when i could be more valuable in some other position and these other men could finish their basic training before shipping from this post. lets all be treated alike and go thru the same fundamentals as every other soldier. we might as well be in civilian life as to be marking time like i have in  the  past months.

outfits_comment: less chance of friction
long: at present i have finished my basic training and am waiting to be shipped as a cadet. my physical duties are guard duty and kp (alternating). i feel that much more could be accomplished if i were allowed to review math and physics. i have the  but not enough time to review them. kp and guard duty are very necessary in every soldier's training. however, in my squadron they are used as two details to keep the casuals busy. casuals should be assigned regular jobs and recognized as being slightly above the trainee in rank. they should also be given privilege not enjoyed by the trainee.
